articles.author: Tuhin Das Mahapatra
articles.title: Meghan Markle slammed for mocking ‘Americans who can’t pay for groceries’ in her new Netflix series - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Meghan Markle's new Netflix series has sparked criticism for its portrayal of luxury amid economic struggles. | World News
articles.content:
Shortly after Meghan Markle announced her new Netflix series on Instagram, some royal fans voiced their dissatisfaction, calling the show terrible and being tone deaf about the poor.
After announcin… [+2321 chars]
